detaileddescription.para: Enumerates the properties of the specified thread Calling thread_property/2 does not influence any thread See also thread_join/2 For threads that have an alias-name, this name can be used in Id instead of the numerical thread identifier Property is one of:

listitem.para: status( Status) The thread status of a thread (see below)
alias( Alias) The thread alias, if it exists
at_exit( AtExit) The thread exit hook, if defined (not available if the thread is already terminated)
detached( Boolean) The detached state of the thread
stack( Size) The thread stack data-area size
trail( Size) The thread trail data-area size
system( Size) The thread system data-area size
